title: Welcome to RVNP
text_content: Apply for May Intake "Technology for Industrialization" OUR VISION Rift Valley National Polytechnic (RVNP) aims to be a center of excellence for quality technical research and development for self-reliance and industrialization in the region. title: About Us
text_content: The Rift Valley National Polytechnic (RVNP) is a giant institution offering a total of over 66 different courses in Higher National Diploma, Diploma, Craft and Artisan Programs. In addition to the full-time courses, the Institute also offers a wide range...
